posts.post_content:
7 T207's for sale - 5 Lionel Carter and 2 with Buck Barker's back notations:

Lionel Carter

  * Daubert - SGC 60/5
  * Bodie - SGC 60/5
  * Hamilton -  SGC 60/5
  * Collins - SGC 40/3
  * [STRIKE]Butcher (Cycle) -  SGC 10/1[/STRIKE] SOLD


Buck Barker

  * [STRIKE]Hageman - SGC A[/STRIKE] SOLD
  * Thomas - PSA 1 (MK)


Images below.

The cards all have great eye appeal - even the Butcher, all things considered, and are a testament to Carter's collection and his eye.  The Daubert, Bodie and Hamilton are difficult to find in this grade or above.

The remaining two cards - Hageman and Thomas - are equally difficult, and come with the back notations familiar to many collectors as made by one of the legends of card collecting - Buck Barker.  While these two cards aren't in the best of shape, they are two of the tougher ones in the Recruit series.

Usual rules on 'first to say "I'll take it" gets it.  Follow-ups on the thread, by PM, or email to [url]mikefrohme@yahoo.com[/url].

Thanks for looking.
--
Mike 
-------------------------------------------------
